title: The Healer
description: Kennedy has grown up around magick, talking to the spirits of the dead, and Angels. The day her family comes for her, her life changes, forever. The day she heals an Angel an ancient Prophecy is set into motion. A fallen Angel, a brother cast into Hell, and a family who only know how to fight and protect. A Witch, a Shapeshifter and a Righteous man. But what the Hell happened to all the Angels? This is a classic story of Good vs Evil, which one will be triumphant?
author: C.L.  Moore
